name: ULevelEditorMiscSettings
doc: Configure miscellaneous settings for the Level Editor.

DefaultLevelStreamingClass: The default level streaming class to use when adding new streaming levels
EditorScreenshotSaveDirectory: The save directory for newly created screenshots
bAutoApplyLightingEnable:
If checked lighting will be automatically applied to the level after a static lighting build is complete.
Otherwise you will be prompted to apply it
bAutoMoveBSPPivotOffset: If true, the pivot offset for BSP will be automatically moved to stay centered on its vertices
bReplaceRespectsScale: If enabled, replacing actors will respect the scale of the original actor.  Otherwise, the replaced actors will have a scale of 1.0
bAvoidRelabelOnPasteSelected: If enabled, will avoid relabeling actors in UUnrealEdEngine::edactPasteSelected
bCheckReferencesOnDelete: If enabled, will force checking references during a delete. Note: disabling this is for advanced usage only and not recommended.
bAllowBackgroundAudio: If checked audio playing in the editor will continue to play even if the editor is in the background
bCreateNewAudioDeviceForPlayInEditor: If checked, will create a new audio engine instance for the play-in-editor window. Otherwise, will re-use the audio device used in content browser.
bEnableEditorSounds: Enables audio feedback for certain operations in Unreal Editor, such as entering and exiting Play mode
